title: Songs IV
text:
into the smiting
sky tense
with
blend

ing
the
tree     leaps
               a stiffened exquisite

i
wait the sweet
annihilation of swift
flesh

i make me stern against
your charming strength


O haste
        annihilator
drawing into you my enchanting
leaves
seo_description: A poem by E. E. Cummings in “XLI Poems”
